Arilan Skincare Makeup Remover, Face & Eye

Brand: Arilan Skincare

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Purified Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Lauroamphodipropionic Acid, Sodium Trideceth Sulfate, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Hexylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglyceri

l, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Directions: Saturate cotton ball with MakeUp Remover. Smooth over entire face and neck, including eye area. Follow with Arilan Gentle Cleanser with Rose Hip. Recommended for use on all skin types.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive T
